items.title: Boycott those who support BJP’s authoritarian politics, Stalin appeals to Muslims

items.summary: Participants of all ages joined the 3 km and 6 km events to raise awareness and funds for cancer research

items.summary: The five-hour service saw top officials from the Trump administration pay tribute to the conservative activist.

items.title: SBV AND VIT sign MoU on translational research, biomedical tech
items.summary: The alliance focuses on medical device innovation, biotechnology, biomedical engineering, bioinformatics, clinical trials, incubation support, and joint project funding.

items.title: Man held for pledging fake gold jewellery in Tirupattur
items.summary: After tracking the suspect through CCTV footage and mobile phone tower signals, police apprehended him at his hideout in Hosur town.

items.summary: Tribals from at least ten remote hamlets that come under Kovilur and Nammiyampattu village panchayats in the hills attended the day-long training at the centre.

items.title: Police Commissioner offers ‘pattu vastralu’ to Goddess Durga for Dasara utsavams
Watch: “No one in Bihar is protesting SIR, it’s just Delhi noise” – Sanjay K Jha | The Hindu Mind
items.summary: In this episode of The Hindu Mind, JDU Working President Sanjay K. Jha makes bold revelations on Bihar’s political future. He shares how Nitish Kumar offered the CM post to BJP in 2020, discusses the impact of double-engine government, and explains why the 2025 election is about Bihar’s next 25 year

items.title: Daughter ignites fresh feud in Lalu family ahead of Bihar election
items.summary: According to the sources in the RJD, Rohini Acharya is unhappy over the expanding influence of Sanjay Yadav, the political advisor to Tejashwi Yadav, in the party; there is speculation that Rohini believes Sanjay is behind the party not entertaining her idea to contest in the upcoming election

items.title: Welfare reform 'must happen', minister says
items.summary: The Work and Pensions Secretary tells the BBC he will press ahead with welfare system changes.

items.title: 5,000 police deployed in Vijayawada for smooth conduct of Dasara festivities
items.summary: The Endowments, Vijayawada Municipal Corporation, Police, Revenue, A.P. Transco, State Disaster Response Force, Medical and Health and other Departments to monitor the situation round-the-clock

items.title: Turkiye's main opposition re-elects leader ahead of key court ruling
items.summary: An Ankara court is set to rule over whether to annul the 2023 congress of the Republican People's Party (CHP) where Ozgur Ozel was elected chairman over alleged irregularities, a case government critics say highlights Turkey's slide towards autocracy.

items.title: A mixed bag of gloom, hope in Kerala’s IT sector over H-1B visa fee hike
items.summary: The hike from $5,000 to $1,00,000 is bound to affect even large IT services companies. The scope for business expansion too will come down. However, experts feel that U.S. companies will set up more global capability centres in India, manned by their own people with expertise, which will benefit tie

items.summary: “Protest is to call out hypocrisy of both India, Pak. governments which are busy celebrating cricket diplomacy, while ignoring the pain, sacrifices and human rights of people of Jammu and Kashmir,” says AIP

items.title: Common man suffering due to ‘dual power structure’ in J&K: Congress
items.summary: The Lt. Governor’s office and the CM’s office do not work in coordination and act on their own without concern for people’s difficulties, says Senior Congress leader Ghulam Ahmad Mir. Statehood for J&K has not been restored despite the Centre’s promise to do that after holding Assembly elections

items.title: Lokesh assures KGBV admission for child labour victim

items.summary: In a bid to reach the U.S. via Mexico, Indian nationals have unlawfully entered Guatemala, EI Salvador, and Honduras; when they are arrested, the Embassy offers translation help and well-being support

items.title: BJP’s Jagdambika Pal takes a dig at Rahul Gandhi’s ‘vote theft’ allegations

items.title: My three boys starved to death. I hope angels bring them home, says Afghan mother
items.summary: The deaths of Ghulam and Nazo’s children are evidence of a silent wave of mortality engulfing Afghanistan, where malnutrition is at unprecedented levels.

items.title: End of an Era: IAF to retire iconic MiG-21 on September 26

items.summary: When JD(U) slipped to third place in 2020 with just 43 seats, Mr. Jha recounts that Nitish had offered the CM’s chair to the BJP; in turn, BJP entrusted Mr. Kumar with the job as the poll was fought in his name

items.summary: About 99% of goods under the 12% GST slab currently will move to 5%. The rejig will also result in 90% items under 28% tax slab coming down to 18% bracket

items.summary: Lando Norris finished seventh after Oscar Piastri crashed in Azerbaijan. Was this a missed opportunity or the result of a difficult set of circumstances?

items.summary: England seal a 2-0 series win over Ireland after a comfortable six-wicket victory in the third T20 at Malahide.

items.summary: Estonia has asked to consult other Nato members after warplanes violated its airspace.

items.title: Dominican Republic says it seized 1,000 kgs of cocaine that was on speedboat destroyed by U.S. Navy

items.title: Trump praises conservative 'giant' Kirk at mega memorial event
items.summary: “That young man, I forgive him,” Erika Kirk said of her husband’s alleged murderer, 22-year-old Tyler Robinson, a gesture that drew uproarious applause from the crowd
